question.title: warning: unknown enum constant XmlAccessType.FIELD reason: class file for javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlAccessType not found
question.body:
I have recently converted a maven project to gradle and then migrating from springboot 2.7 to 3x I am using Jakarta instead of javax as it is Java 17. Most of my unit tests are now failing. I am getting the following error:

warning: unknown enum constant XmlAccessType.FIELD reason: class file for javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlAccessType not found

I have excluded any javax dependencies and have included required jakarta dependencies. I have tried everything I could think of to fix this

More Details Originally I was using the following dependencies:

implementation "jakarta.xml.bind:jakarta.xml.bind-api:3.0.1"
implementation "org.glassfish.jaxb:jaxb-runtime:3.0.2"

which uses the following imports:

import jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBContext;
import jakarta.xml.bind.JAXBException;
import jakarta.xml.bind.Marshaller;
import jakarta.xml.bind.Unmarshaller;

and caused the error I sent above

Reading other articles here I tried changing to an older dependency:

implementation "jakarta.xml.bind:jakarta.xml.bind-api:2.3.2"
implementation "org.glassfish.jaxb:jaxb-runtime:2.3.2"

which uses:

import javax.xml.bind.JAXBContext;
import javax.xml.bind.JAXBException;
import javax.xml.bind.Marshaller;
import javax.xml.bind.Unmarshaller;

which does not give the same warning but the tests all still fail. For example:

java.lang.IllegalStateException at DefaultCacheAwareContextLoaderDelegate.java:180
        Caused by: org.springframework.beans.factory.UnsatisfiedDependencyException at ConstructorResolver.java:795
            Caused by: org.springframework.beans.factory.UnsatisfiedDependencyException at ConstructorResolver.java:795
                Caused by: org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanCreationException at ConstructorResolver.java:648
                    Caused by: org.springframework.beans.BeanInstantiationException at SimpleInstantiationStrategy.java:177
                        Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError at JaxbConfiguration.java:20
                            Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException at BuiltinClassLoader.java:641

This issue is different than the previously linked one as:

  1. I have ensured No javax.xml.bind Dependencies are being pulled
  2. I have updated all dependencies to be jakarta
  3. I have added jakarta JAXB dependencies (you can see above)
  4. I have Excluded javax.xml.bind Transitive Dependencies
  5. I have checked for Classpath Conflicts and there are none
